messages.subject: Re: Rue's Unschooling Book
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/15/2005 6:54:18 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: **That s  a nice thing to sound like!  My
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/15/2005 6:54:18 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

**That's a nice thing to sound like! My father-in-law's not so lucky - his
name is Dick Kream <G>. ~Rue



*********************
That may be the saddest (and funniest) thing I ever heard. His parents must
have had a truly sick sense of humor.
Kathryn

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Rue's Unschooling Book
messages.msgSnippet: I just thought I would repeat all this, something Kelly sent a week and some back, mostly because I wanted people to have the address again.    I still haven t
messages.messageBody:
I just thought I would repeat all this, something Kelly sent a week and some
back, mostly because I wanted people to have the address again. I still
haven't received my "real" books, but I got to read it pre-publication, and all
the good things people say are absolutely true. I love the tone, and I love
the format, and it's all the information people had to read for years to
gather, years ago, and from now on can get from that book.


Rue Kream is ready to take orders for her new book. She's not
comfortable blowing her own horn, but *I* am delighted to! <G>

Entitled _Parenting a Free Child: An Unschooled Life_, it is in a Q&A
format where Rue answers most, if not all <g>, of the questions we all
have heard or will hear as unschoolers.

It's a sweet, gentle book---just like Rue! And self-published!

I hope she will be flooded with your orders!

Here's her new website to promote the book---go judge this book by its
lovely cover! http://www.freechild.info/

That's Rue's cute little butt! <g>

~Kelly, tickled to death to announce this!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Rue's Unschooling Book
messages.msgSnippet: I probably missed all the original on list praise and discussion, but I just had to say... Loved it!        Wonderful!       A respectful parenting &
messages.messageBody:
I probably missed all the original 'on list' praise and discussion, but I just had to say...


Loved it! Wonderful! A "respectful parenting" & "unschooling" & "joyful living" must read!!!


I want a "FREE THE CHILDREN!" bumper sticker and a T-shirt and a hat...


Thanks Rue!
And thanks to all those who inspired her and supported her.

Beth in MD
